title: The Duchess’s Dangerous Love Life - Novel Updates

author: 유연
description:
One day, her husband died. 

And Adele, who until then had lived in peace as the Duchess, tried to go back to her family.  However, her husband’s younger brother, Noah Maktus, requested her hand in marriage by citing an old law that dictated that the now widowed duchess needed to marry him. 

So Adele has no choice but to go ahead and marry him in order to resolve the family issue. But now she has to face her first night with him… 

“It’s not your first night, why are you trembling?” 

“…..”

“Oh, is it because it’s your first time having sex?”  

Adele recalled two years ago, her late husband, who opened her clothes on the first night and only said, “I am sorry.”  

She was happy without sex. It was okay. She could live without something like this without the pleasures of the flesh.

“Sister-in-law, have you ever eaten c*ck?”  

“….!” 

“I’ll let you enjoy the pleasures of a woman in the future.” 

Two of his fingers squeezed into Adele’s entrance, 

“Every night….” 

“Ooh…!” 

Thick, hard fingers stirred Adele’s soaked insides.  

“I’ll make you cry from pleasure in my arms…” 

“Ah…”

“Yes, make you beg for it every night…”>
